issues.description: [Missing Context] Readers cannot quickly determine if this documentation applies to them. Evidence: No immediate indication of the project's purpose or target audience (Source: Redish, Task-Oriented Writing)
issues.suggestion:
Add a concise context statement explaining project type and intended users. Before: "# Infrastructure & Deployment Guide" → After: "# Documentation Analysis Tool - Infrastructure & Deployment Guide

*A technical documentation evaluation framework for developers and technical writer..."
issues.context: # Infrastructure & Deployment Guide

issues.description: [Cognitive Load] Readers might struggle to understand the immediate benefits. Evidence: Sentence contains multiple complex concepts without clear breakdown (Source: Nielsen Norman Group, Cognitive Load Principle)
issues.suggestion:
Split into focused, shorter statements. Before: "This project is now fully containerized and follows security best practices for easy deployment and ..." → After: "Key Improvements:
- Full containerization for consistent environments
- Enhanced security practices
- Simplified deployment and development workflows"
issues.context: This project is now fully containerized and follows security best practices for easy deployment and development.

issues.description: [Unclear Heading] Users cannot immediately understand the scope of this Docker option. Evidence: Lacks specific information about what this option entails (Source: Pirolli & Card, Information Scent Principle)
issues.suggestion: Add a brief descriptor explaining the Docker workflow. Before: "Option 1: Docker (Recommended)" → After: "Option 1: Docker Containerized Deployment (Recommended for Most Users)"
issues.context: Option 1: Docker (Recommended)

issues.description: [Undefined Jargon] Users might not understand where to obtain this key or its significance. Evidence: API key mentioned without context of origin or purpose (Source: Plain Language Guidelines, Jargon Explanation)
issues.suggestion: Provide brief explanation and reference source. Before: "`ANTHROPIC_API_KEY`: Your Claude API key" → After: "`ANTHROPIC_API_KEY`: API key from Anthropic for accessing Claude AI services (sign up at https://www.anthropic.com)"
issues.context: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY

issues.description: [Ambiguous Instruction] Users cannot confidently activate full analysis mode. Evidence: No clear, step-by-step guidance on enabling full mode (Source: Redish, Task-Oriented Writing)

- ✓ All quality checks..." → After: "## Full Mode (With API Key)

### Prerequisites
1. Obtain Anthropic API Key
2. Configure `.env` file
3. Set `ENABLE_AI_ANALYSIS=true`

### Available Fe..."
